title: Login issues on mobile app
description: Unable to login to the mobile application. Getting 'Authentication Failed' error even with correct credentials.

title: Payment gateway not working
description: Credit card payments are failing during checkout process. Error code: PG-4021

title: Password reset not sending email
description: Requested password reset but not receiving the reset link email. Checked spam folder as well.

title: Dashboard loading slowly
description: User dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load. This started happening after recent update.

title: Report generation error
description: Monthly sales report fails to generate with 'Memory Allocation Error'. Tried multiple times.

title: Mobile app crashing on startup
description: App crashes immediately after splash screen on iOS devices. Android works fine.

title: Invoice formatting issues
description: Generated invoices have misaligned text and broken formatting in PDF export.

title: API rate limiting too strict
description: Getting 429 errors too frequently. Need higher rate limits for our integration.

title: Data sync delay between devices
description: Changes made on web app take over 5 minutes to sync to mobile app. Expected real-time sync.

title: Unable to delete user account
description: Delete account option is grayed out in settings. Need assistance removing account permanently.

title: Two-factor authentication setup failing
description: QR code scan for 2FA not working. App says 'Invalid QR code' repeatedly.

title: Export data to CSV corrupted
description: Exported CSV files have encoding issues and special characters appear broken.

title: Notification emails going to spam
description: System notification emails are being marked as spam by Gmail and Outlook.

title: Calendar integration not syncing
description: Google Calendar integration stopped syncing events 2 days ago.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Request to add dark mode theme to the web application for better nighttime usage.
